derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French valeriane, from medieval Latin valeriana (herba), apparently the feminine of Valerianus 'of Valerius' (a personal name)

means.word_mean: 1. a plant of the genus Valeriana having lobed or dissected leaves and cymose white or ink flowers
